title: Mini-Ep 109: Give Yourself Grace
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 109: Give Yourself Grace
itunes:subtitle: Kate tests out some new Fat and the Moon skincare and makeup products and Doree can’t stop playing Mahjong. Then listeners weigh in on the wonder of micellar water, boob masks, how to “show up” for your partner, and what winding down for the evening lo...
description:
Kate tests out some new Fat and the Moon skincare and makeup products and Doree can’t stop playing Mahjong. Then listeners weigh in on the wonder of micellar water, boob masks, how to “show up” for your partner, and what winding down for the evening looks like without alcohol. 


Please find a list of anti-racism resources here.
